Hi

2008/11/1 kelly parker <bigblockfw@...>:
> Thinking a bit more along the same path (pun intended) would be G code
> optimization.
> I don't know if you've ever watched a cnc mill wander around waisting time
> but it's expensive
> if you're mass producing something like PCBs.

This sounds similar to the travelling salesman problem - multiple
points to visit and trying to minimize the overall distance travelled.
So if the layout is already determined you're probably looking at well
know algorithms for TSP (or TSP like problems). On the other hand the
manufacturing cost of a PCB could be factored into the fitness
function of a layout finding algorithm.

Colin
